page.title: 05Life Styles E.K. Schoolday.
page.content: {07.00 >}I wake up looking forward to the day ahead of me and get dressed right away .A bowl of cereal is ready for me to eat .I leave for the shops to get my weekly soccer magazine. {09.00 >}We start the morning doing mathswork and we stop at 10.25 to have a carton of milk.Five minutes later we have a break.I have a game of football with my classmates. {NOON >}It's time for lunch and I go to my gran's house.We spend the afternoon discussing Crime Prevention and we design some posters. {16.00 >}I have my supper then I clean my football boots .I am playing football that night. We win 4_3 and I spend the rest of the night watching Television. { 21.30 >}Tired,I go to bed after brushing my teeth.
